about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our Story
about.description: EA Transport is a leading international transport company headquartered in Albania, specializing in freight logistics across Europe. With over 8 years of experience and a modern fleet of 15+ vehicles, we deliver reliable, fully insured transport services to 30+ countries.
about.story_p1: EA Transport was founded with a clear mission: to bridge the gap between Albania and European markets through reliable, efficient, and professional freight transport services. From day one, we have prioritized building lasting relationships with our clients based on trust and transparency.
about.story_p2: Over the years, we have grown from a small local operation to a trusted logistics partner for over 500 businesses across the continent. Our success is built on a solid foundation of punctuality, cargo safety, competitive pricing, and unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction. We handle everything from customs clearance to last-mile delivery.
about.story_p3: Today, we operate a modern fleet of trucks, refrigerated vehicles, and express vans, staffed by a team of experienced logistics professionals. Every shipment is fully insured and tracked in real-time, giving our clients complete peace of mind from pickup to final delivery.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: Your goods are safe with us.

partners.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
partners.subtitle: Working with the best companies in Europe

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions
faq.cant_find_answer: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please contact our friendly team.

q1.question: Which countries do you cover?
q1.answer: We cover all European Union countries, as well as the Western Balkans and Turkey.

q2.question: How long does transport take?
q2.answer: Transport time depends on the destination. For Italy, usually 1-2 days, for Germany 3-4 days.

q3.question: Do you offer cargo insurance?
q3.answer: Yes, all our shipments are insured. Basic insurance is included in the price.

q4.question: How can I track my shipment?
q4.answer: You will receive a tracking number that you can use on our website.

review1.text: EA Transport has been our reliable partner for over 3 years. Their punctuality and professionalism are unmatched in the region.
review1.name: Marco Rossi

review2.text: We ship weekly from Tirana to Germany and have never had a single issue. Excellent communication throughout the entire process.
review2.name: Arben Hoxha

review3.text: Fast customs clearance and competitive pricing. They handle everything so we can focus on growing our business.
review3.name: Elena Berisha

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: EA Transport is committed to protecting the privacy of our users and clients. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website or use our services.
privacy.collection_text: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you fill out our contact or quote request form, including your name, email address, phone number, company name, and shipment details. We also automatically collect certain technical information such as your IP address, browser type, and pages visited through cookies and similar technologies.
privacy.use_text: We use the information we collect to respond to your inquiries and quote requests, provide our transport and logistics services, improve our website and user experience, send you service-related communications, and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.sharing_text: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and delivering our services, and when required by law or to protect our rights.
privacy.security_text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.rights_text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You may also object to or restrict certain processing of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided on our Contact page.
privacy.contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@transport-ea.com.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to EA Transport. By accessing and using our website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully before using our services.
terms.services_text: EA Transport provides international freight transport, refrigerated transport, and express van delivery services between Albania and Europe. All services are subject to availability and our acceptance of your shipment request.
terms.quotes_text: All quotes provided through our website or by our team are estimates and may be subject to change based on actual shipment details, dimensions, weight, and route conditions. Final pricing will be confirmed before shipment. Quotes are valid for 7 days unless otherwise stated.
terms.liability_text: All shipments are covered by our standard cargo insurance. EA Transport's liability is limited to the terms of the applicable insurance policy. We are not liable for delays caused by force majeure events, customs procedures, or circumstances beyond our control.
terms.obligations_text: Clients are responsible for providing accurate shipment information, ensuring goods comply with all applicable laws and regulations, properly packaging goods for transport, and providing all necessary documentation for customs clearance.
terms.prohibited_text: We reserve the right to refuse transport of illegal goods, undeclared hazardous materials, items that violate import/export regulations, and any goods that could pose a risk to safety or the environment.
terms.termination_text: Either party may terminate the service agreement with written notice. EA Transport reserves the right to refuse service to any client who violates these terms.
terms.law_text: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of the Republic of Albania. Any disputes shall be resolved in the courts of Tirana, Albania.
terms.contact_text: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at info@transport-ea.com.
